ModMetaData.name: Prisoner Ransom
ModMetaData.author: erdelf, Anarcraft
ModMetaData.description:
This mod allows you to demand ransom in silver for prisoners at the comms console. If successful, it will give a slight relation boost--but be careful! The faction may decide to raid you if relations are too damaged. Leaders are worth more and will likely be more friendly to you after that. Originally created by erdelf, updated by Primuth.
FAQ: Can I add your mod to my save game, remove it? Yes, it can be safely added to, and removed from, saved games.
Can I add your mod to my modpack? Yes, so long as the mod is included in it's entirety. You do not need to ask or notify me.
Can I make an edited copy of your mod? Yes, so long as you include the MIT license.
